member.name: T:SCFM.Constraint_Dmax_Test
member.remarks: These tests are not based on any testing framework: they are constructed by using regular classes and methods. Static class since it only contains a set of static methods.

member.name: M:SCFM.Constraint_Dmax_Test.Instantiation_and_Querying(VMS.TPS.Common.Model.API.ScriptContext)
member.summary: Method that checks the instantiation through all available constructors and the usage of all properties of an object of type when appropriate arguments are provided (exceptions are not tested).
member.param: The context provided by Eclipse. Type: .
member.returns: The result of the test in terms of a single boolean variable, resulting from a logical AND of all individual checks (true = pass, false = fail). Type: .
